scenario_text.value: Hmm... Nothing here, huh?

I’m sensing something awful from somewhere
underneath us.
Then we’d better start heading down.
Wah?!
Yeep!
Ahhh! D-d-don’t scare me like that!

What was that? It sounded like someone’s
phone.
Haha, sorry about that! It was mine.
Yeah, mine too... It’s...a message?

Wait, seriously?! Who’s it from? And how’s
that possible?!
Yeah, what’s it say?

What the—? This doesn’t make any sense. It’s
just a string of random symbols.

I can’t read mine either. It’s...kind of
creepy.

You know, I got a garbled message when I was
investigating the shrine, too.

And you didn’t think to mention that until
now? That’s important information!

Well... It was all nonsense, and it only
happened once. I thought it was nothing.

(I got a garbled text when I was here, too.
Could this all just be coincidence?)
(What should I do about this message?)
Forget it.
Try responding.
This happened before.
Forget it.

I think we’ve got bigger things to worry
about right now. Let’s just forget it.

Are you crazy? This might be how we can send
a message to our world! We gotta try!
Try responding.
You think...we should try responding?

Good idea! Maybe this will let us actually
get in touch with someone!

Wait, is this seriously what you think we
should be doing right now?
This happened before.

You know, this isn’t the first time this has
happened...

Oh yeah. Now that you mention it, you’re
right. Only we never knew what to make of it.
So, you think this could be significant?

It does seem important, but the Master’s our
top priority right now. Let’s focus on him.
Yeah... You’re right.
Let’s go, everybody!
